title: Iridium's Desch: NEXT Satellite Launch Will Boost Growth(Audio)
itunes:title: Iridium's Desch: NEXT Satellite Launch Will Boost Growth(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Matt Desch, CEO of Iridium, on launching its NEXT generation constellation of satellites with SpaceX, which will make it the largest commercial constellation in space.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
